title: Not just Big Tech: under-the-radar corporations rushed to donate to Trump's inauguration
summary: Major corporations donated millions to Trump's 2025 inauguration, with private prison firms CoreCivic and GEO Group contributing $2.8 million, and Carrier Global Corporation donating $1 million, while holding significant government contracts
description: Major corporations, including CoreCivic, GEO Group, and Carrier, quietly donated millions to Trump's inauguration while holding lucrative government contracts or lobbying interests

sources.title: Private Prison Firms Donated Millions to Trump's 2025 Inauguration
sources.description: Detailed breakdown of CoreCivic and GEO Group's inaugural donations

sources.title: Trump Inauguration Donors: Corporate Influence and Government Contracts
sources.description: Overview of corporate donors and total inaugural fundraising

sources.title: Brennan Center Report: Million-Dollar Donors Flood Trump's Second Inauguration

notes: Comprehensive documentation of corporate donations to 2025 presidential inauguration
